trans-unit.source:
Stop Auto Play
If you activate this option, then the slider will no longer change between the items until the user says so. (bei clicking the arrows or pressing left and right key on his keyboard).

Stop Infinite Wrap
If you activate this option, then the slider will not start over when the slide items are done.

Hide Arrows
If you activate this option, then the slider will no longer have the right and left arrow displayed.

Hide Bulletes
If you activate this option, then the slider will no longer have the bullet navigation displayed.

Deactivate swipe
If you activate this option, then the user will not be able to swipe the Slider with his fingers when he uses his mobile device

Stop keyboard Navigation
If you activate this option, then the user will not be able to use the computer keys to change the slide (right and left key on keyboard)

Pause on Hover
If you activate this option, then the slide will not change/move while your mouse is pointing on the slider.

Stop M.U.I
If you activate this option, then the slide animation will not be available anymore. (fade-in, slide-in-left e.t.c.)

Animation In Left
Choose the animation you would like to be displayed when the slider is coming from the left side. (Or click the left key / button)

Animation Out Left
Choose the animation you would like to be displayed when the slider is going away from the left side. (Or click the left key / button)

Animation In Right
Choose the animation you would like to be displayed when the slider is coming from the right side. (Or click the right key / button)

Animation out Right
Choose the animation you would like to be displayed when the slider is going away from the right side. (Or click the right key / button)

Timer Delay
Choose the duration in miliseconds. That means how much time the slider will keep on display each item.
